contract models a supply chain process on the blockchain. It includes multiple roles: supplier, transporter, manufacturer, wholesaler, distributor, and consumer. Each role has its specific functions which can only be executed by an address assigned that role. The contract uses a shared ledger to record every step of the process, making it transparent, secure, and efficient. Unlike traditional supply chains, every stage of the process is recorded on the blockchain. This contract is a part of the BriteLedgers protocol.This contract adopts the owner and authorized user design pattern, it uses cryptography for secure communication and ensures trustless interaction in the supply chain.","events":{"CommodityStatus(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Event includes the commodity address, Consumer's address and changeUserRole(uint256,address).details: Allows the owner to change the role of a user.

params._role: The new role of the user.

commodityRecievedAtWholesaler(address).details: Calls the receivedCommodity function of the Commodity contract.

params._address: The address of the Commodity contract.

createRawMaterialPackage(bytes32,uint256.details: Ensure the proper access controls and error handling (if needed), add events to capture the important state changes TODO: Require checks can be added for inputs

params._description: the description of the raw material
params._quantity: the quantity of the raw material

getAllPackages().details: Access controls can be added here to restrict this sensitive information TODO: Access Controls using OpenZeppelin's AccessControl.sol TODO: Consider returning more detailed information about each package

returns._0: an array of addresses of the packages of the supplier

getNoOfPackagesOfSupplier().details: This can be used to quickly check how many packages a supplier has TODO: Consider returning more detailed information about each package

returns._0: the number of packages of the supplier

getUserInfo(address).details: Allows the owner to get the user information of the given address.

params._addr: The address of the package origin
params.transportertype: The type of transporter (1- Supplier to Manufacturer, 2 - Manufacturer to Wholesaler, 3 - Wholesaler to Distributer, 4 - Distributer to Customer)

params.RcvrType: The type of the receiver (encoded as a uint256)
params._rawAddr: The array of addresses of raw materials used for the commodity
params._recieverAddr: The address of the receiver of the commodity
params._transporterAddr: The array of addresses of transporters for the commodity

params._addr: The address of the RawMaterial contract

registerUser(bytes32,string[],uint256,ad.details: Registers a user with a given name, location, role, and address. Can only be executed by the owner of the contract. Emits a UserRegister event after successful registration.

supplierCreatesRawPackage(bytes32,uint25.details: Creates a package of raw material. Can only be executed by a supplier.

transferCommodityWtoD(address,address,ad.details: Creates a new CommodityW_D contract for the transfer.

params._address: The address of the Commodity contract.

CommoditiesAtWholesaler(address,uint256).notice: Maps a wholesaler's address to an array of commodity addresses that the wholesaler has received.

CommodityBatchAtFinalConsumer(address,ui.notice: Tracks the commodities at the Consumer

CommodityDtoC(address,uint256).notice: Track transfer of commodities from distributor to customer

CommodityWtoD(address,uint256).notice: Maps a wholesaler's address to an array of CommodityW_D contract addresses that the wholesaler has initiated.

CommodityWtoDTxContract(address).notice: Maps a commodity's address to the CommodityW_D contract address that manages its transfer from a wholesaler to a distributor.

commodityRecievedAtDistributor(address,a.notice: Function to be called when a commodity is received at the distributor

commodityRecievedAtFinalConsumer(address.notice: Function to be called when the Consumer receives a commodity

commodityRecievedAtWholesaler(address).notice: Marks a commodity as received by the wholesaler.

createRawMaterialPackage(bytes32,uint256.notice: Create a new raw material package

getAllPackages().notice: Get all packages of a supplier

getNoOfPackagesOfSupplier().notice: Get the number of packages of a supplier

handlePackage(address,uint256,address).notice: Function to handle picking of packages

manufacturerCommodities(address,uint256).notice: Track the commodities produced by manufacturers

manufacturerCreatesCommodity(address,byt.notice: Function called when a manufacturer creates a new commodity

manufacturerRawMaterials(address,uint256.notice: Track the raw materials owned by manufacturers

manufacturerReceivedPackage(address,addr.notice: Function called when a manufacturer receives a package of raw materials

sale(address).notice: Tracks the sale status of commodities

salesInfo(address).notice: Function to get sales information for a given commodity

transferCommodityDtoC(address,address,ad.notice: Function to transfer commodity from distributor to customer

transferCommodityWtoD(address,address,ad.notice: Initiates the transfer of a commodity from the wholesaler to a distributor.

updateSaleStatus(address,uint256).notice: Function to update the sale status of a commodity
